title: op-node, op-batcher, op-proposer fail to start (make devnet-up-deploy)
body:
**Describe the bug**
op-node, op-batcher, op-proposer fail to start in devnet.

Logs of failing services:
```bash

$ docker-compose logs op-node op-batcher op-proposer
Attaching to ops-bedrock_op-batcher_1, ops-bedrock_op-proposer_1, ops-bedrock_op-node_1
[36mop-batcher_1   |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:47+0000 lvl=info msg="Initializing Batch Submitter"
[36mop-batcher_1   |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:50+0000 lvl=eror msg="Unable to create Batch Submitter" error="querying rollup config: Post \"http://op-node:8545\": dial tcp 172.22.0.4:8545: connect: no route to host"
[36mop-batcher_1   |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:50+0000 lvl=crit msg="Application failed"               message="querying rollup config: Post \"http://op-node:8545\": dial tcp 172.22.0.4:8545: connect: no route to host"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=info msg="Initializing Rollup Node"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=info msg="Rollup Config"            l2_chain_id=901 l2_network="unknown L2" l1_chain_id=900 l1_network="unknown L1" l2_start_time=1,686,746,787 l2_block_hash=0x7e184486d121b4bc6a58c86bd3288f61a004b00c5a215651e3ffb488ae8374e8 l2_block_number=0 l1_block_hash=0xbab50f82a97185c2505b2a3c8d165e9b98cf4b95f6ceccbfe3d99adafcb7d92e l1_block_number=0 regolith_time="@ genesis"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="failed to fetch runtime config data" err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to verify retrieved proof against state root: failed to verify storage value 0 with key 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 (path 31a88f3936348d602f3078126bdcd162c575cb17fb9bbfe2dab00b167bd295c3) in storage trie 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421: proof node 0 (hash 56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421) missing"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="failed to fetch runtime config data" err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to verify retrieved proof against state root: failed to verify storage value 0 with key 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 (path 31a88f3936348d602f3078126bdcd162c575cb17fb9bbfe2dab00b167bd295c3) in storage trie 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421: proof node 0 (hash 56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421) missing"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="failed to fetch runtime config data" err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to verify retrieved proof against state root: failed to verify storage value 0 with key 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 (path 31a88f3936348d602f3078126bdcd162c575cb17fb9bbfe2dab00b167bd295c3) in storage trie 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421: proof node 0 (hash 56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421) missing"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="failed to fetch runtime config data" err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to verify retrieved proof against state root: failed to verify storage value 0 with key 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 (path 31a88f3936348d602f3078126bdcd162c575cb17fb9bbfe2dab00b167bd295c3) in storage trie 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421: proof node 0 (hash 56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421) missing"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="failed to fetch runtime config data" err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to verify retrieved proof against state root: failed to verify storage value 0 with key 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 (path 31a88f3936348d602f3078126bdcd162c575cb17fb9bbfe2dab00b167bd295c3) in storage trie 0x56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421: proof node 0 (hash 56e81f171bcc55a6ff8345e692c0f86e5b48e01b996cadc001622fb5e363b421) missing"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="Error initializing the rollup node"  err="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=eror msg="Unable to create the rollup node"    error="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"
[33mop-node_1      |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:46+0000 lvl=crit msg="Application failed"                  message="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"
[32mop-proposer_1  |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:47+0000 lvl=info msg="Initializing L2 Output Submitter"
[32mop-proposer_1  |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:47+0000 lvl=eror msg="Unable to create the L2 Output Submitter" error="no contract code at given address"
[32mop-proposer_1  |[0m t=2023-06-23T11:47:47+0000 lvl=crit msg="Application failed"               message="no contract code at given address"
```

**To Reproduce**
`make devnet-up-deploy`


**Expected behavior**
All services are up and healthy.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/assets/1867551/36a71ed9-3ea5-479f-98d8-944316a3c512)


**System Specs:**
 - OS: Ubuntu 
 - Package Version (or commit hash): e4985632b33861c27cc939b84ef30e94f137b609
Did you try to `make devnet-clean` before ?
